thread.section_title: Plastek Cards Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Plastek Cards | plastekcards.com
thread.title: Laura

author: Laura
title: Laura
text: I was extremely pleased with the personal care that was given to helping me with my first order. The customer service was amazing, over the top! The customer representative made sure that all my questions were answered and was prompt in replying to my emailed questions! Very impressed with the quality of the cards. The artwork is clear and the colors are true to the original design that was sent to them.
